body:
Awkweird,

1. Back to version of EnergyPlus, I'm thinking to move to EP8.2 this weekend for the development version, and will send a notification so you can give it a try if you like.

2. The issue is related to downloading base files that you need to run Honeybee. Update to the new version of Ladybug and Honeybee and it will work fine.

Mostapha
